body.name: Miabella 925 Sterling Silver or 18Kt Yellow Gold Over Silver Italian Rosary Bead Cross Y Necklace Chain for Women
features: SPIRITUALLY SYMBOLIC - Wear your faith with this classic Italian crafted 925 sterling silver bead station rosary necklace featuring a Miraculous Medal of the Virgin Mary and polished cross pendant that dangles from a 3” drop. This timeless elegant chain can be worn as a religious symbol or as an everyday cool fashion statement. Looks equally beautiful with casual jeans and t-shirt as it does with a dressy outfit. Wear alone or a layering necklace.

CHOICE OF 18K GOLD PLATED 925 STERLING SILVER OR PURE 925 STERLING SILVER - Handcrafted of 925 sterling silver to give your jewelry a brilliant shine. Sterling silver is hypoallergenic and nickel-free making this a great choice for individuals with very sensitive skin. Rosary chain necklace, 20" or 24" inch long with 3" drop. Spring ring clasp for strong security.

MADE IN ITALY - Italian jewelry has the highest government quality standards unmatched by any other country in the world. The superior design excellence, quality craftsmanship and durability of Italian jewelry makes it a fine investment. You can feel the difference of Italian manufactured jewelry.

GIFT FOR HIM OR HER - Unique and inspirational gift for the man or woman who appreciates quality and fine craftsmanship. A chain the makes a statement with style, show someone you care with a sentimental gift of faith. It’s the perfect gift idea for wife, husband, mom, dad, girlfriend, best friend or for YOU. VISIT OUR STORE: For a selection of rings, bangle and chain bracelets, hoop and stud earrings, necklaces and coin jewelry in sterling silver and 18K gold over silver.

GIFT BOX INCLUDED - Miabella jewelry is shipped in a gift box, ready to treat yourself or a loved one for Birthday, Christmas, Mother’s Day, Father’s Day, Anniversary, Valentine’s Day, Confirmation, Easter, Graduation and any other holiday or special occasion gifting.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Genuine Italian 925 Sterling Silver Honoring Italy’s rich history of silver craftsmanship, our jewelry captures the precious metal’s beauty and brilliant shine. Silver is 92.5% pure silver and 7.5% copper to enhance its luster, strength and durability. Miabella embodies the luxury of Italian artistry and modern design. Dress Up or Dress Down Our jewelry pairs perfectly with formal wear for a sophisticated look or denim for a relaxed casual look. We create our collections with pairing in mind: all of our jewelry can be layered seamlessly to reflect your unique style and individuality. The Perfect Gift Your Miabella purchase will arrive in a beautifully packaged gift box, making it ready to delight for any occasion. Miabella is your destination for high quality, accessible jewelry that will light up the face of anyone who receives it. Sterling Silver Jewelry Care To preserve the appearance and longevity, clean your silver jewelry regularly with an anti-tarnish polishing cloth and avoid contact with household chemicals, swimming pools and salt water. This is also true for sweat, so make sure you remove your jewelry when you exercise or do anything requiring heavy work. Allow perfume, spray or lotion to dry before wearing your jewelry. Do NOT use an anti-tarnish cloth on gold plated jewelry, instead rub gently with a soft cotton cloth. Store in a dry place.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have been wearing this 24 7 since I got it 8 months ago. Sort of suprising something so delicate is holding up so well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is the perfect length to hang right in your cleavage! And the sterling silver is so bright and beautiful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: When I received this product I was surprised by the fact that it was so small. In my head I was getting a full size rosary. That was my fault because I should have been more thorough when reading the post. It was very pretty that’s why I gave it 4 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this rosary I think more than any of my other rosaries. I know some people have said that this is a discraise to wear the rosary as a piece of jewelry. And honestly some people want to wear a statement piece with out people asking them about it. I wore my regular rosaries and had tones of questions form people curious about the necklace. I told them about it of course, but this necklace is for those who want the power of the rosary but not the bulkieness or the heavieness. Plus if your praying in public you could possibly go around the chain instead of taking it off to pray. It will move around your neck rather than holding it in your hands like normal. The clasp is finiky even for my 30 years young fingers. But these clasps have always been difficult. If your worried about this necklace braking I wouldn't. Mostly because I was seeing if I could brake into my jewelry kit and chance the clasp to one easier to open so I could pray with it. However, all of the jump rings are solid rings, you would have to cut them off. So, I don't think that this can be broken unless someone is really going at it and pulling extra hard on it. I was worried about my cat chewing on it and accidently swallowing a part of my necklace. Even though I'm still going to supervise her, I don't think she will be able to chew it off within a few seconds. Those are just a few things that I have a complaint about is the clasp. However the design and the durability is amazing. Especially if you have a jewelry cleaner to clean all the rust and stuff off with the continual wear. I can't even tell its on my neck at all. I also have metal allergies and so far so good. No rash or irritation. I think this is a perfect piece of protection to wear and if you wore other chains with it no one would even know it was a rosary unless their catholic or like me just a person who loves the rosary.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This necklace is very pretty, the only thing is the clasp is down by the pendant, why would they design it that way? I returned it. very strange.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great quality especially for the price
Es una pieza muy bonita y delicada, tienes que tener cuidado por que a mi se me rompió y no se como arreglarlo. Pero realmente es muy bonito y plata real.
It’s absolutely beautiful I love it so much. I got my friend one too. Fast delivery
Me gusto mucho este collar rosario, tiene un muy buen largo al cuello, trae la medlla milagrosa muy bella. Muy buena calidad.

reviews.reviewText: Bonsoir le chapelet est très beau mais le fermoir est très difficile à accrocher il a un défaut au niveau pour l accrochez dommage cordialement m virzi brigitte
